item.title: Olive Garden Pasta Pass
item.author: Nathan Petersen
item.description: I ate at Olive Garden 25 times in 8 weeks. You might be wondering: why did I do this, how could I afford it, did I get fat, if I am tired of pasta, or even if I am crazy? Keep reading for the answers as I attempt to explain my experience with the Olive Garden Pasta Pass. The prized Olive Garden Pasta Pass in its ostentatious box" The prized Olive Garden Pasta Pass in its ostentatious box Not Sponsored This post is not sponsored by Olive Garden, although that’d be nice.
